Package com.concordia.soen6441riskgame

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    RGStrategy  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AllTests
    This is for running all the test files at ones.
    Prueba  
    RGCapturedTerritoryFrame
    Class that creates a frame that is shown when a player captures a territory in Attack Phase.
    RGCardsFrame
    Class that creates a frame that shows up on the screen when a player clicks on use Cards in Reinforcement Phase.
    RGDominationView
    Class that creates a panel to show the "Players World Domination View" with the following information: 1) The percentage of the map controlled by every player.
    RGFile
    Class to manage the file where a Risk map is stored.
    RGFileTest
    This is a test class containing cases to validate the game map and a reinforcement method
    RGGame
    Class to control the game for human players.
    RGGameAggressive
    Class to control the game for players with an aggressive strategy.
    RGGameBenevolent
    Class to control the game for players with a benevolent strategy.
    RGGameCheater
    Class to control the game for players with a cheater strategy.
    RGGameFrame
    Class that creates a frame with three panels: 1) On the left panel, players can see the Risk map.
    RGGameRandom
    Class to control the game for players with a random strategy.
    RGGameTest  
    RGGraph
    Class that implements a collection of lists not only to represent a graph but also to handle the information of continents, cards, counties, the game, and the players.
    RGGraphTest  
    RGMapEditorFrame
    Class that creates the starting frame of the application.
    RGMapView
    Class that creates a panel to show the "Map View" with the image of the map and the number of army placed in every country.
    RGPhaseView
    Class that creates a panel to show the "Phase View" with the following information: 1) Name of the game phase currently being played.
    RGPlayer
    Class to control the information of the players.
    RGPlayersFrame
    This class creates a frame where the user is asked to enter the names of the players of the Risk® game.
    RGPlayerStrategy
    Class to change a player strategy during play time.
    RGPlayerTest
    This is a test class containing test cases to validate the player data structure i.e: Validate Number Of PLayers, current number of armies, player turn, calculation of number of reinforcement armies etc
    RGTournamentManager
    Class to implement Tournament mode to be played on different maps, having different computer players strategies.
    RGTournamentModeFrame
    Class that creates the frame for the tournament mode.
    RGTournamentResultFrame
    Class that creates the frame to display the table showing the results for the tournament mode.
    RGTournamentTest
